text: The state constitution may be amended so that the minimum age for serving in the state Senate is lowered to 18-years-old.
Lawmakers want to take speed camera technology statewide by installing 170 new traffic cameras over the next five years.
Applicants for public assistance will soon have to take a drug test and pass to receive benefits.
The state can no longer contract with entities who have invested over two million dollars in Iran's energy or financial sectors.
The state constitution may be amended so that the minimum age for serving in the state Senate is set to 30-years-old
Lawmakers want to take camera technology statewide by installing 200 cameras over the next five years to deter crime.
Applicants for public assistance must not have a drug history in order to receive benefits.
The state can no longer contract with entities who have invested over two million dollars in Syria's energy or financial sectors.
